instruction: Output a conversation between two people at a job interview.
output:
Interviewer: So tell me, why do you want to be a part of this company? 
Candidate: I have always been passionate about technology, and this company has innovate solutions to many of the problems in the industry. I believe my skills and knowledge will be an asset to the company. 
Interviewer: That's great to hear! Can you tell me a bit more about your experience in the field? 
Candidate: Sure. I have been working in the industry for the past 5 years and have gained a lot of insights and skills that I believe would be invaluable to this company.
